entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
